component.name: Postman
component.summary: Postman is a complete API development environment.

description.p: Postman is the complete toolchain for API developers, used by 5 million developers and more than 100,000 companies worldwide to access 130 million APIs every month. Postman makes working with APIs faster and easier by supporting developers at every stage of their workflow, and is available for macOS, Windows, Linux and Chrome users.
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Postman or Postdot Technologies.

ul.li: Fixed a bug where null and undefined values in variables were shown as empty in variable suggestion tooltip
Fixed an issue where changelog was not formatted properly
[GitHub #6624] - Fixed a bug where renaming a request re-opened all items in Collections tab of sidebar when a filter was set
Fixed a bug where cookies with Max-Age are not deleted
Fixed an issue where data-file with BOM characters or encoding other than UTF-8 were not working
[GitHub #5230] - Fixed a bug where double borders for request URL were shown when zooming in or out
Fixed a bug where API gets stuck in loading state when the user is offline
Added ability for users to request higher roles on APIs shared within a team
